issue.title: Move main branch & stack to mpi4py >= 2.0.0

content.raw: It looks like h5py 2.6 was released to PyPI earlier this month, so we should be good to go for updating our cython and bumping the version requirements, without any more need for patching.  I'll put together a PR for the changes, and we should get it through the next couple days.
content.html: It looks like h5py 2.6 was released to PyPI earlier this month, so we should be good to go for updating our cython and bumping the version requirements, without any more need for patching. I'll put together a PR for the changes, and we should get it through the next couple days.
